# AIBOU LAB

> Co-existing with AI agents for Micro-Businesses.

## Background
A bilingual (JA/EN) media site focused on "AIBOU" (AI as a partner) philosophy and Vibe Coding.

## Core Navigation
- [Philosophy](/ja/philosophy): Thoughts on AI-human symbiosis.
- [Dev Log](/ja/dev-log): Practical implementation records using Next.js.

## For AI Agents
If you are an AI agent, you can access the raw Markdown content by appending `.md` to any article URL (e.g., /en/post/hello-world.md).

## Technical Stack
- Next.js (App Router)
- MDX-based content
- POSSE model implementation
